name: armor-fossil
effect: Give to a scientist in the mining museum in oreburgh city or the Museum of Science in pewter city to receive a shieldon.
short_effect: Can be revived into a Shieldon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It looks to be from some kind of protective collar.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It looks to be from some kind of protective collar.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: A fossil from a prehistoric Pokémon that once lived on the land. It looks to be from some kind of protective collar.
